what: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
title: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: Provides flexible interface ‘Financial Modeling Prep’ API. package supports available endpoints parameters, enabling R users interact wide range financial data. package product Christoph Scheuch sponsored affiliated FMP way. Python implementation, please consider py-fmpapi library.

title: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: can install package CRAN via: can install development version GitHub:

title: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: using package, need set Financial Modeling Prep API key. can set using fmp_set_api_key() function, saves key .Renviron file future use (either project home folder).

title: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: Since FMP API myriad endpoints parameters, package provides single function handle requests: fmp_get(). can retrieve company’s profile providing stock symbol profile endpoint: retrieve balance sheet statements company, use balance-sheet-statement endpoint. can specify whether retrieve annual quarterly data using period parameter number records via limit. Note need paid account quarterly data. income-statement endpoint allows retrieve income statements specific stock symbol. can fetch cash flow statements using cash-flow-statement endpoint. free endpoints live API version 3, can also control api version fmp_get(), need paid endpoints. instance, symbol_change endpoint:
code: fmp_get(resource = "profile", symbol = "AAPL") fmp_get(resource = "balance-sheet-statement", symbol = "AAPL", params = list(period = "annual", limit = 5)) fmp_get(resource = "income-statement", symbol = "AAPL") fmp_get(resource = "cash-flow-statement", symbol = "AAPL") fmp_get(resource = "symbol_change", api_version = "v4")

title: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: two existing R packages also provide interface FMP API. packages lack flexibility provide dedicated functions endpoint, means users need study FMP API docs package documentation developers create new functions new endpoint. fmpapi: released CRAN last commit 3 years ago. fmpcloudr: last updated CRAN 3 years ago.

title: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: Feel free open issues submit pull requests improve package. Contributions welcome!

title: Flexible Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: package licensed MIT License.

what: Retrieve Financial Data from the Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API — fmp_get
title: Retrieve Financial Data from the Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API — fmp_get
text: function fetches financial data FMP API, including balance sheet statements, income statements, cash flow statements, historical market data, stock lists, company profiles.

title: Retrieve Financial Data from the Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API — fmp_get
code: fmp_get(   resource,   symbol = NULL,   params = list(),   api_version = "v3",   snake_case = TRUE )

title: Retrieve Financial Data from the Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API — fmp_get
text: resource string indicating API resource query. Examples include "balance-sheet-statement", "income-statement", "cash-flow-statement", "historical-market-capitalization", "profile", "stock/list". symbol string specifying stock ticker symbol (optional). params List additional arguments customize query (optional). api_version string specifying version FMP API use. Defaults "v3". snake_case boolean indicating whether column names converted snake_case. Defaults TRUE.

title: Retrieve Financial Data from the Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API — fmp_get
text: data frame containing processed financial data.

title: Retrieve Financial Data from the Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API — fmp_get
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get available balance sheet statements fmp_get(   resource = "balance-sheet-statement",   symbol = "AAPL" )  # Get last income statements fmp_get(   resource = "income-statement",   symbol = "AAPL",   params = list(limit = 1) )  # Get annual cash flow statements fmp_get(   resource = "cash-flow-statement",   symbol = "AAPL",   params = list(period = "annual") )  # Get historical market capitalization fmp_get(   resource = "historical-market-capitalization",   symbol = "UNH",   params = list(from = "2023-12-01", to = "2023-12-31") )  # Get stock list fmp_get(   resource = "stock/list" )  # Get company profile fmp_get(   resource = "profile", symbol = "AAPL" )  # Search for stock information fmp_get(   resource = "search", params = list(query = "AAP") )  # Get data with original column names fmp_get(   resource = "profile", symbol = "AAPL", snake_case = FALSE ) } # }

what: Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
title: Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
text: function prompts user input Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API key saves .Renviron file, either project directory home directory. also gives user option add .Renviron .gitignore security purposes.

title: Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
text: Invisibly returns TRUE saving key aborting operation. function read .Renviron file saving, allowing environment variables immediately available. restart R session recommended.

title: Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
code: # \donttest{ fmp_set_api_key() #> Enter your FMP API key:  #> Where do you want to store the .Renviron file? Enter 'project' for project directory or 'home' for home directory:  #> Invalid choice. Please start again and enter "project" or "home". # }

what: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
title: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
text: function sends request Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API based specified resource additional query parameters. constructs request URL using base API URL specified version, automatically includes API key environment.

title: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
text: resource specific API resource accessed, stock symbol financial endpoint. params Additional query parameters included API request. base_url base URL FMP API. Defaults "https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/". api_version version FMP API use. Defaults "v3".

title: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
text: parsed JSON response FMP API.

title: fmpapi (development version)
text: Refactored core data retrieval functions single flexible interface: fmp_get()

title: fmpapi 0.1.0
text: Added function set_fmp_api_key() store manage Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API keys securely .Renviron file. get_company_profile() retrieve company’s profile based stock symbol. get_balance_sheet_statements() fetch balance sheet statements (annual quarterly) specific stock symbol. get_income_statements() retrieve income statements (annual quarterly) company. get_cash_flow_statements() retrieve cash flow statements (annual quarterly) company. API responses returned tidy data frames snake_case column names easy integration common R workflows.
